mapper.select: SELECT room_id, room_name, room_type, capacity, base_price, room_status, created_at FROM meeting_rooms
SELECT room_id, room_name, room_type, capacity, base_price, room_status, created_at FROM meeting_rooms WHERE room_status = TRUE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting_rooms (room_id, room_name, room_type, capacity, base_price) VALUES (NEXT VALUE FOR room_seq, #{roomName}, #{roomType}, #{capacity}, #{basePrice})
mapper.select: SELECT mr.base_price + COALESCE(SUM(e.additional_price), 0) AS total_price FROM meeting_rooms mr LEFT JOIN room_equipment re ON mr.room_id = re.room_id LEFT JOIN equipment e ON re.equipment_id = e.equipment_id WHERE mr.room_id = #{roomId} GROUP BY mr.room_id, mr.base_price

SELECT mr.room_id FROM meeting_rooms mr LEFT JOIN room_availability ra ON mr.room_id = ra.room_id AND ra.schedule_date = #{date} WHERE mr.room_status = TRUE AND (#{roomType} IS NULL OR mr.room_type = #{roomType}) AND ( ra.room_id IS NULL OR (BITAND(ra.hour_status, CAST(#{timeMask} AS INTEGER)) = 0) )
